availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Alice Smith (Louisville, Jefferson County, Kentucky, sex worker and madam.)

body.p: Louisville, Jefferson County, Kentucky, sex worker and madam. New York native. Sex worker and madam in Louisville in 1860. Employed Haddie Seymour, Dora Forrester, Anna McCord, Laura Sands, and Mary Campbell as sex workers in Louisville in 1860.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville Ward 1, p. 205.
